scripts.initialize: npm i && npm run download-submodules && npm run install-submodules && npm run build:all
scripts.download-submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd lib/solidstate-solidity && git checkout e23bd67e28a8435ea9f2cca2cfa2c87cd7febd18 && cd -
scripts.install-submodules: npm run init:feedbase && npm run init:gemfab && npm run init:weth && npm run init:uniswapv3 && npm run init:chainlink
scripts.init:feedbase: cd lib/feedbase && npm i && npx hardhat compile
scripts.init:weth: cd lib/weth && npm i && node build.js
scripts.init:uniswapv3: cd lib/uniswapv3 && npm i && node build.js
scripts.init:chainlink: cd lib/chainlink && npm i && node build.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ts && npm run build:sol && npm run build:feedbase && npm run build:gemfab
scripts.js-build-test: npm run build:sol && npm run js-test
scripts.verify-vat: certoraRun spec/harness/VatHarness.sol spec/harness/BlankHook.sol lib/gemfab/src/gem.sol:Gem --verify  VatHarness:spec/Vat.spec --link VatHarness:rico=Gem --link VatHarness:rico=Gem --msg 'vat verification' --optimistic_loop
scripts.verify-vow: certoraRun spec/harness/VowHarness.sol src/vat.sol:Vat src/flow.sol:DutchFlower spec/harness/Gems.sol:Gem0 spec/harness/Gems.sol:Gem1 --verify  VowHarness:spec/Vow.spec  --link VowHarness:vat=Vat VowHarness:RISK=Gem1 VowHarness:RICO=Gem0 VowHarness:flow=DutchFlower Vat:rico=Gem0 --msg 'vow verification' --optimistic_loop
scripts.verify-vox: certoraRun src/vox.sol:Vox src/vat.sol:Vat --verify Vox:spec/Vox.spec --link Vox:vat=Vat --msg 'vat verification' --optimistic_loop
